abstracts.cdata!:
The Seventh Banque de Developpement
            Economique de la Tunisie Project will meet part of
            BDET's requirements for the financing of import
            components of specific industrial enterprises (US$28
            million), and to finance expansion of existing small-scale
            enterprises through BDET (US$2 million).
